nodes.text: Bespin Fizz was a fizzy alcoholic beverage that was red in color and served in a tall and thin glass with a cloud of steam. It was suitable for human consumption, and shared its name with the planet Bespin. The cocktail was served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. During that year, the Chadra-Fan female Kriki drank the beverage during a visit to the cantina.

Bespin Fizz is one of the alcoholic beverages that is sold in the real-world Oga's Cantina bar at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge in Disney's Hollywood Studios only. It was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. The menu's description reads, "Bacardi Superior Rum, yuzu purée, pomegranate juice, white cranberry juice, and a cloud swirl."
